testcase.name: Login Page
testcase.system-out: Given user Launch The Application...........................................passed When user Enter The Username In Username Filed..............................passed And user Enter The Password In Password Field...............................passed Then user Click The Login Button And It Navigates To Search Hotel Page......passed

testcase.name: Select Hotel
